header.title: INTRODUCING TNEPRES RA & THE DIARY OF A DEVILWORSHIPPER VOLUME III
header.category: Western Esotericism, Occultism, Satanism, Jungian Psychology, Chaos Magic

central_thesis: The text posits a system for radical individual alchemical transformation, moving beyond conventional ego-driven existence to a state of 'Self-Awareness' or 'Enlightenment' through confrontation with personal 'Shadow' aspects and the manipulation of causal and acausal energies. This process, rooted in the Sinister Tradition of the Order of Nine Angles (ONA), redefines traditional occult concepts, viewing them as tools for achieving a 'Galactic Self' and influencing Aeonic change, ultimately leading to a 'Perpetual Satanism' that actively shapes reality through conscious will and engagement with the 'Abyss'.

structure_content.summary: Details the author's personal journey of alchemical transformation through ONA texts, emphasizing the shedding of the DWR persona and the development of Tnepres Ra to pursue higher aims, embracing challenges for self-understanding and ultimately finding an 'un-mystified explanation of genuine Satanism'.

structure_content.chapter_title: RADIA SOL: EMANATIONS OF THE SELF - A THEORY
structure_content.summary: Presents a theoretical model exploring the metaphysical process of the Psyche's shift from Ego to Self. It introduces 'Psychanisms' (Unconscious, Ego, Self) which emanate frequencies (Radia Sol) for self-recognition and dominance, influenced by wave mechanics and the Acausal.

structure_content.chapter_title: BE IT EVER SO SINISTER – THERE’S NO PLACE LIKE HOME
structure_content.summary: An exploration of personal psychological complexes using Jungian concepts. The author interprets disturbing dreams and parental 'Imagos' through a Satanic lens, aiming for self-integration by confronting and embracing the 'Shadow' aspects of his psyche.

Proposes a theoretical model where reality is generated by dual 'engines' (Ego and Environment) through a 'Simultaneous Pulse.' This process creates an infinite sequence of variables, focusing subjective perception into a 'Reality' and allowing for the Will to shape this construct.

structure_content.chapter_title: NOTES ON THE Nth DEGREE OF NUMINOSITY
structure_content.summary: Describes a diagrammatic model of four distinctive stages of consciousness, representing an evolutionary ladder from materialistic, 'sub-human' awareness to a 'Living Flux' where consciousness aligns with the Acausal, transcending fixed forms.

Expounds the 'Art of Changing' as the ability to transcend reliance on fixed forms and use names/words to manipulate the 'Matrix' (consensus reality) for specific changes, emphasizing the illusory nature of accepted truths and the Shifter's conscious will.

Reveals the author's use of pseudonyms (Ryan Anschauung, Tnepres, Tnepres Ra) for anonymous infiltration and performing 'Insight Roles.' It details the esoteric and symbolic meanings of these names in his personal and magical quest.

structure_content.chapter_title: THE PHILOSOPHERS STONE ~ A BEGINNERS GUIDE ~
structure_content.summary: Defines the Philosophers Stone not as a singular object, but as a 'ring of truths' and multiple 'Selves.' Its attainment requires self-honesty, balancing 'good' and 'evil,' and individual effort, leading to a profound reinterpretation of reality and self-mastery.

structure_content.chapter_title: IN SEARCH OF THE BLACK ROSE
structure_content.summary: Documents the author's attempt to teach Satanism, emphasizing the power of belief, practical magic, and self-experience over dogma. It includes correspondence illustrating the challenges and insights gained in guiding others in esoteric practice.

Critically analyzes the structure and intent of Scientology's axioms, viewing them as a system of persuasion designed to manipulate the reader's perception of reality. It contrasts this with genuine esoteric insight and the ONA's approach.

structure_content.chapter_title: BLACK MAGICKAL SYMPATHY AND THE STAR GAME
structure_content.summary: Explains the ONA's Star Game as a complex, multi-dimensional tool for sympathetic black magic. It describes its use in mapping energetic nodes of individuals or Aeons to direct and control them, utilizing layered mathematical and symbolic elements.

Critiques the practical limitations of the advanced Star Game's physical design, suggesting that its apparent 'flaws' (e.g., visibility, reach) are intentional lessons in abstraction, pushing practitioners to perceive beyond physical forms.

Outlines specific strategies for playing the exoteric Star Game, highlighting its mathematical certainty and tendency toward stalemates in perfect play. It emphasizes human error as a crucial element for introducing chaos and achieving victory.

Discusses methods for simplifying the Star Game's alchemical transitions, proposing the use of cubes with six symbols and color trims to streamline piece manipulation and aid in visual recognition during play.

structure_content.chapter_title: BENEFITS OF THE STAR GAME: AS A TRAINING DEVICE FOR MANAGING A TEMPLE
structure_content.summary: Highlights the Star Game's utility as a training device for Temple management. It develops skills in subtle, overt, and deceptive manipulation, understanding the 'Butterfly Effect,' and expanding one's chronological perspective for Aeonic thinking.

Recounts the author's experience tutoring 'Aevea' in ONA Satanism, focusing on the development of self-honesty and the challenges of manipulation. It includes a vivid dream interpretation related to the Hel archetype and the dilemma of sacrificing another's will.

A collection of correspondences between the author (Ryan) and Arcturus, discussing the creation of the Naos Deck, the symbolism of Sinister Tarot (e.g., angular sigils for Dark Gods), and the artistic and esoteric challenges involved.

An esoteric narrative employing Egyptian symbolism as a metaphor for the author's realization of the futility of rigid forms and the efficacy of the Aryan Religion. It describes a journey of self-discovery and freedom from dogmatic thought.

The author's explanation of 'Sechnacht' as an attempt to imitate secretive esoteria, using Egyptian prose for aesthetic qualities and psychological vibrations. It's a metaphor for his insight into the futility of 'grabbing at branches' and the realization of being 'set free from Time'.

A cryptic, Arthurian-style prose piece that serves as an admonition against over-reliance on written doctrine and hearsay in the Satanic Quest. It emphasizes the necessity of direct, hands-on experience and self-discovery to achieve genuine insight, using metaphors of Kings, Knights, and Dragons.

A poetic prose piece using numerical 'Equationism' to convey the immense complexity of reality and the profound indifference of the Dark Gods. It describes seeing reality as continuously self-generating numbers and outlines the alien nature of entities 'beyond the Matrix'.

Explores geometric models (tetrahedron, 18-pointed star) to understand the Acausal and the micro-macro relationships. It suggests that by projecting internal processes outward, one can gain a clearer picture of the subconscious, linking these insights to the structure of the Star Game.

Introduces the ONA's 'Web of Wyrd' as a system incorporating dual-Gates (Star/Man, Dark/Earth) and two Luciferic Planes. The Abyss serves as a dangerous gateway to these planes, presenting risks to the magician who renounces their quest.

structure_content.chapter_title: NOTES ON THE SINISTER TRADITION e.XI
structure_content.summary: Transcribed correspondence explaining the angular symbols in the Sinister Tarot. These symbols are not initials but relate to Dark Gods and energies, derived from numerical systems and spirals, containing coded information for esoteric contexts.

Describes the Naos Deck as the 'World's First complete, genuine, public, Sinister/Satanic Tarot,' designed to challenge traditional Qabalistic Tarot and re-present archetypal and cosmic energy. It emphasizes the deck's role in a 'magickal war' between the Sinister and the Magian.

structure_content.chapter_title: ON ANGLES AND CURVES [AND THE ONA] PART I
structure_content.summary: A theoretical essay aimed at contextualizing the ONA's 'Nine Angles' and 'Curves.' It challenges linear perceptions of space and time, suggesting Angles are irrational dimensions or 'gateways' that alter consciousness and expand perception beyond human comprehension.

structure_content.chapter_title: ON ANGLES AND CURVES (AND THE ONA) PART 2
structure_content.summary: Further examines the ONA's Nine Angles, suggesting they are not literal entities but an 'alchemical formula' or 'vehicles' used to achieve a perpetual process of self-transformation. It highlights the ONA's method of combining two aspects to create a third, representing dialectical change.

structure_content.chapter_title: ON ANGLES AND CURVES [AND THE ONA] Part 3
structure_content.summary: Discusses ONA's hypothetical goals of replacing traditional spiritual paths with a Satanic substitute and the necessity of 'irrational magick.' It references the creation of a 'Diamond Body' and alien stages of immortality, though the manuscript remains unfinished due to data loss.

structure_content.chapter_title: ON THE DECISION TO RELEASE THE ANGLES AND CURVES MSS (FROM MYSELF TO TERROSA)
structure_content.summary: A reflection on the author's decision to release his revealing manuscript, considering its potential impact on the Order and readers. He sees his writings as both a 'double-edged sword' and a means to 'heal others' by confronting grand illusions.

A text with a dual purpose: to summarize the ToB's aims for ONA Initiates and to reveal the ToB's true nature to discerning readers. It discusses the 'Blood Pool' concept, 'Noctulians' as vampire-like Adepts, and the strategic manipulation of cults for 'Sinister' ends.

An analysis of characters in a fictional narrative ('ACB'), identifying their roles as Satanists and Magian agents. It details their methods of infiltration, manipulation, and instigation of conflict to further sinister aims and unleash 'Satanic energies'.

A personal poetic narrative describing a brutal near-death experience due to alcoholism and assault. This event leads to a profound alchemical transformation, a 'cold clinical gleam,' and a realization of self, mortality, and the 'sickly sweet Satan,' leading to a sense of being 'dead' among the living.

Documents a personal journey of self-discovery through skepticism, direct experience in nature, and intellectual exploration. The author observes chaos and patterns in human behavior, learning to mold self and environment, viewing all experiences as teachers and students.

Introduces a system for 'mental metamorphosis' using sigils as 'living forms' that can alter and change. This process aims to break causal and spatial restraints, allowing the psyche to comprehend numinous and 'Galactic/Aeonic' forces, transforming the individual into a 'Star-Man'.

Explains the ONA's 'Web of Wyrd,' focusing on the two 'missing Angles' as dual-Gates (Star/Man, Dark/Earth) and two Luciferic Planes. These planes are accessed via the Abyss, which holds the greatest dangers for a magician who deviates from the quest.

A poem that speaks of 'a Hand' holding the 'Fates of Men' and 'Power that resurrects the harvest of blood via the Dark Gods.' It describes the crumbling of causal structures when 'Idea' and 'Symbol' combine, leading to a new understanding of creation.

A poem depicting a state of dissolution and integration with chaos. The 'I' is dissolved, the internal projects the external, and the world is perceived as non-existent without meaning, leading to a sense of having 'nowhere to go'.

A personal narrative detailing a walk through nature, reflecting on the contrast between raw nature and human-imposed 'grid-like boundaries.' It explores the author's artistic struggles, the impact of his declining eyesight on perception, and a sudden disappearance of a playground, leading to insights about nature and self.

key_concepts.definition: A framework for individual alchemical transformation and Aeonic change, often challenging conventional occult interpretations and aiming to bridge esoteric theory with practical application.
The author's higher persona, symbolizing 'Serpent Sun' and 'Illuminator,' representing the quest for self-knowledge, alchemical transformation, and the will to 'light the way of Satan'.
The internal psychological structure comprising Unconscious, Ego, and Self. These three aspects constantly vie for dominance, with emanations serving as a mechanism for self-recognition and control.

Metaphorical 'beams of psyche' radiated by an organism's dominant Psychanism (Ego or Self) to reflect itself off other organisms ('mirrors') or external stimuli, thereby defining itself and affirming its dominance.

The Acausal is an alternate, multi-dimensional realm beyond linear time and space, serving as the source of energy and synchronicity, intersecting with the Causal (our three-dimensional reality) to create 'Life'. The Causal is subject to linear progression, while the Acausal is not.

The consensual, often illusory, reality constructed by human perception, cultural conditioning, and shared meanings. It is a 'meta-reality' where forms shift and take shape based on collective agreement.

An operation of dual flux between the Ego and the Environment, continuously generating content and subjective 'Reality'. It involves pockets of content 'fluxing' into one another, creating an unlimited sequence of variables that shape perception.

'e' represents the human will, the driving force to shape 'E' (Environment/matter) to suit its needs and desires. This constant struggle to 'mould the black clay' of the environment maintains artificial forms over natural ones, defining reality.

A model of four distinctive stages or degrees of consciousness/realization, representing an evolutionary ladder from materialistic, 'sub-human' awareness (1st Degree) to a 'Living Flux' (4th Degree) aligned with the Acausal, where consciousness transcends fixed forms and opposites.

The 'Art of Changing,' involving the conscious manipulation of forms and names to influence the 'Matrix.' It is based on understanding the illusory nature of accepted truths and using words/symbols as 'clay to build a literary sculpture' for specific magical changes.

Not a singular object, but a 'ring of truths' and a 'RING of Selves,' attainable through self-honesty, balancing the extremes of 'good' and 'evil,' and intense personal effort. It grants the power to change one's view of the world and self at will.

A complex, multi-dimensional, alchemically-based chess-type game. It is used as a tool for sympathetic black magic to capture the essence ('energetic nodes') of individuals or Aeons, allowing for their direction and control. It develops intuitive awareness and strategic manipulation skills.

Esoteric concept within ONA, representing irrational dimensions, 'pockets of strange time and space,' or 'gateways' to alien realms. They are viewed as vehicles for alchemical transformation, helping to broaden the psyche and access acausal charge, ultimately to be discarded as the initiate progresses.

Archetypal entities or energies beyond the Matrix and 'The Equation,' described as 'black numberless forms' or 'convenient abstractions.' They are meant to be understood and integrated for alchemical transformation, not feared.

A sinister meditation (music and monologue) produced by the ONA. Its themes and imagery are used as a basis for the symbolism in the Minor Arcana of the Naos Deck, facilitating personal transformation and the opening of 'Star-gates'.

The 'World’s First complete, genuine, public, Sinister/Satanic Tarot.' Created by the author, it challenges traditional Qabalistic Tarot systems and incorporates ONA concepts, symbolism, and alchemical processes, aiming for a 'magickal war' against Magian misrepresentations.

The belief in macro-level cycles (Aeons) of civilizations (300-1200 years), which influence human consciousness. Aeonic magic aims to enact supra-personal change, leading to the growth and decline of civilizations and the eventual emergence of a 'Galactic Aeon'.

Vampire-type creatures that individuals are transformed into through alchemical ordeals, serving as 'Adepts' for the 'Blood Pool' and participating in sexual or sacrificial rites for the ToB (Brotherhood of Black Earth).

A nexion where the Acausal meets the Causal, requiring constant 'feeding' (physical or intellectual 'blood'/'sacrifice') to grow into an 'autonomous dark force'. It is contrasted with ONA nexions which open gateways for self-transformation.

A ritual in which the Priest (masculine) and Priestess (feminine) join with a crystal tetrahedron to form a Nexion, symbolizing the synthesis of opposites (causal/acausal, male/female energies) for magical transformation.

practical_system.description: The system outlined is a multi-faceted approach to individual alchemical transformation and reality manipulation, deeply rooted in the ONA's Sinister Tradition. It involves a rigorous program of self-study, psychological introspection (integrating Jungian concepts like Ego, Self, Shadow, Anima/Animus), and practical magical exercises. The core objective is to transcend the 'Ego' and foster the 'Self' by consciously interacting with 'Acausal' energies, thereby achieving higher states of consciousness, or 'Enlightenment' (Philosophers Stone). This involves 'Shape-Shifting' one's persona, manipulating the 'Matrix' (consensus reality) through 'Will to Power,' and engaging with symbolic systems like the Naos Deck and Star Game to map and influence energetic nodes. The system emphasizes direct, 'hands-on' experience, self-honesty, and a 'demonic tenacity' to continually evolve and shape one's personal and Aeonic 'Wyrd', moving beyond traditional moral constraints.
tools: ONA Texts and Manuscripts (for philosophical foundation, theoretical models, and practical guidance)
Naos Deck (a Sinister Tarot deck used for meditation, insight, and symbolic representation of alchemical processes and Aeonic energies)
Star Game (a multi-dimensional chess-like game with seven boards and 90+ pieces, used for strategic training, sympathetic magic, and mapping energetic nodes)
Quartz Crystals (especially pyramid-shaped, for charging with sexual energy and for 'gateway' functions in rituals)
Self-researched and self-created planetary incenses (relevant to personal environment and cosmos)
Magickal Names/Personas (e.g., Tnepres, Aevea, DWR, Ryan Anschauung) for role-playing, psychological detachment, and embodying archetypes
Dream Journal (for recording and interpreting dreams and subconscious activities)
Nunchuku (for martial arts practice, physical discipline, and channelling/controlling energy)
A 'psychroscope' (a metaphorical tool to examine and understand the mind's processes as a 'psychic landscape' or 'map')
Artistic Expression (drawing, writing, music) as a means of 'externalizing' internal states, manipulating symbols, and influencing others
rituals: Self-Immolation Rite (sex magic ritual for opening 'Star-gates' and channelling 'dark intentions', involving specific acts like anal copulation and visualization of abyss opening)
Superstition Exercise (deliberately breaking personal superstitions to understand and master the 'power of belief')
Sigil Magic (writing down desires, tangling letters into symbols, and concentrating on them for manifestation)
Sympathetic Magic (constructing physical models representing desires and visualizing them vividly to manifest reality)
Visualization (silently imagining desires coming true with strong will and belief)
Playing the Star Game (a complex strategic game for mapping energetic nodes of individuals/Aeons, developing sympathetic awareness, and influencing targets through black magic)
Heirogamos (a ritual joining of Priest/Priestess with a crystal tetrahedron to form a 'Nexion', symbolizing the synthesis of masculine/feminine and causal/acausal energies)
Dream Journaling and Lucid Dream Control (for exploring subconscious activities, gaining insights, and achieving 'total control over lucidity')
Actively confronting and integrating one's 'Shadow' aspects and 'psychic demons' through introspection and 'slaying' them to gain power and self-knowledge
Performing 'Satanic Deeds' to influence the world and challenge existing structures, often through subversive or manipulative actions (implied via Kathryn's actions in Star Game narrative)

relevant_quotes.text: The sculpted persona of DWR was slowly cast aside and Ryan began developing his new human face; using the persona of DWR less and less as he found himself setting goals to achieve higher aims rather than boosting his Ego aimlessly for psychological highs.

Tnepres Ra, indeed all my personas: represents that which is highest in all of us. I do not take any serious credit for those who would attribute this creative engine that never stops cranking as belonging to me.
The power of Music is a very crucial KEY to a Sinister Revival: hence the banning of white power music and continuing pressure against White Pride.

The discarding and transcending of the Ego via ‘alchemical’ processes poses some interesting inferences. That the Ego is not necessarily the ‘be-all and end-all’ of our organisms intellectual and spiritual capacity, and that the emergence of a new species of capacity can be attained by shedding the older ego-based skin of the conscious through the harsh alchemical processes mentioned within alchemical-based texts, is interesting enough.

The Philosophers Stone is all of these and none of these, It is in essence the power of a human to create an eternity of interpretation which allows it to change how it views the world and itself at will in order to change things.

Because of what you must achieve to GET the Stone – should you come to possess it – you will be Equilibrium and thus no risk will be present to the Universe in your owning it. The maturity of this outlook cannot be faked – it is indeed an alchemical process that deeply marks the individual as a Stone Wielder / and cannot be artificially replicated. There are few who are willing to work for the Stone, and even fewer who work for the Stone for the right reason – Self-Honesty.
Black magick is what you do when you put your will over someone elses without their consent.
What you’re actually dealing with when you talk about magick is really the power of belief.
Magick does take many forms. But before you can start with the outside you have to begin with the inside. Therefore you have to know what’s inside you.

But after slaying many of these monsters I saw something very powerful in the act. No longer in fear of my past and then understanding it, the monsters became part of me – united with me because they no longer have control over me. They are part of me. And I am part of them. And both of us, are part of IT.

The Star Game is a complex multi-dimensional, alchemically-based chess-type game utilizing seven boards and upward of 90 pieces, and is used (or played) much the same way pins are used in a “voodoo doll” with different alchemical combinations designed to capture the essence of an individual or an Aeon in order to direct and control it – it being an advanced structure for working sympathetic black magic.
The Star Game teaches abstract thought. Abstract thought is the ability to free the mind from taking a stance or position as absolute, while simultaneously asserting and dissolving its absolutism.
The Naos Deck is genuinely Satanic, Elite, it is for Satanists who move the Ethers – not joy riders.
We are All Monsters living a lie. To wake a Monster is the act of Evil.
I was not dead. I had only died. And it was like a cold clinical gleam entered me, upon piecing together where I was.

critical_analysis.relevance: This work is highly relevant to contemporary Western Esotericism and Occultism, offering a deeply personal yet theoretically structured contribution to Sinister Traditionalism (ONA). It contextualizes the ONA's philosophy within a broader framework of psychological alchemy, quantum theory, and Aeonic change, pushing practitioners beyond dogmatic adherence to engage with the underlying mechanisms of magic and reality. The author's candid self-reflection, especially concerning his artistic process and personal struggles, provides a unique perspective on the lived experience of occult practice. It challenges simplistic 'good vs. evil' paradigms, advocating for a nuanced understanding of forces for personal and collective evolution. The text serves as both a philosophical treatise and an experimental guide, inviting readers to explore complex concepts through personal experience and critical inquiry, thereby contributing to the evolution of occult thought and practice.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The primary target audience consists of advanced practitioners and initiates of the Order of Nine Angles and related Sinister traditions. It also appeals to serious students of Western Esotericism, Chaos Magic, and Jungian psychology interested in the practical application of these theories for self-transformation and reality manipulation. The text is explicitly not intended for 'joy riders' or those seeking superficial knowledge, demanding 'self-honesty,' intellectual rigor, and a willingness to confront unsettling truths and 'psychic demons'. It is geared towards individuals committed to a demanding path of continuous self-development and the active shaping of their 'Wyrd' (destiny).
